entry.title: First Beginnings
entry.summary:
First Meeting

A group of comitted parents and educators are meeting at this very moment in Navan Educate Together National School on Commons Road Navan.
entry.content:
First Meeting

A group of comitted parents and educators are meeting at this very moment in Navan Educate Together National School on Commons Road Navan.

Please help

Please use our Expression of Interest form to register your interest in sending your own children to Meath based secondary school run according to the Educate Together Ethos.
